name: inDESERT
description:
PLEASE READ: THE GAME DOES NOT HAVE AN END SCREEN

Submission for Juice Jam II
Theme: PAYING THE PRICE
Implementation: Everything you do damages you, damaging an enemy heals you. (very original idea)

Ran out of ideas for the name ok.

Controller is supported.

CONTROLS:
- MOUSE AND KEYBOARD -
WASD: MOVEMENT
SPACE: JUMP
LEFT CLICK: ATTACK
SHIFT: DASH
CTRL: LOCKON
FCVB: CHANGE LOCKON

- CONTROLLER (XBOX LAYOUT) -
LEFTSTICK: MOVEMENT
A: JUMP
X: ATTACK
RB: DASH
LB: LOCKON
RIGHTSTICK: CHANGE LOCKON

Third-party assets:
Shapeforms Audio Free SFX
FilmCow Royalty Free Sound Effects Library
